title: Duas de Letra
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Portuguese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee shop and art gallery at the north side of São Lázaro's Garden. Offers snack foods with traditional as well international flavors throughout the day. Sources organic produce. Ground level with tables, a counter and a backyard terrace; on the first floor there are more tables, a glass greenhouse and also a gallery that works as a room for hosting events.
